FuncDef: This command triggers the host connectivity verification checks and applies only to the 7450 ESS and 7750 SR.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the service ID to diagnose or manage. Values-1 to 2147483647.
Specifies the physical port identifier portion of the SAP definition.
Specifies an existing SLA profile name. The SLA profile is configured in the config>subscr-mgmt>sla-profile context.
